name: サターンボンバーマンファイト!!
summary:
Saturn Bomberman Fight!! (サターンボンバーマン ファイト！！) is a 1997 maze video game developed and published by Hudson Soft for the Sega Saturn. It is the second Bomberman game for the Saturn, after Saturn Bomberman. It features full 3D graphics unlike previous titles in the series.
Unlike previous Bomberman titles, which were 2D, Saturn Bomberman Fight!! is a fully 3D game featuring an isometric viewpoint. It features 14 characters. The stages are smaller than previous 2D Bomberman titles, and it features up to four players.
